mapper.select: SELECT cart_id, goods_count, goods_name, IF(LEFT(goods.goods_cover_image, 1) = '/', CONCAT('/file', goods.goods_cover_image), goods.goods_cover_image) AS goodsCoverImage, selling_price, cart.goods_id FROM cart CROSS JOIN goods ON cart.goods_id = goods.goods_id where user_id = #{userId} AND cart.is_deleted = 0
